__e: I've been really wrong about a lot. But I was right about one thing:
Oh, I probably missed some, but it will still be my best grade yet.
Do you need any help with this?
Well, the fact of the matter is, I have wronged each and every one of you in some way.
I only thought it was a three. But I found it, and I'll take you there if you want.
Okay, so clearly I made the wrong choice, but that's just because I don't understand what you're trying to tell me.
Yes, yes, I am. I think I've got the wrong time, so I'd probably better just...
I'm supposed to meet a friend and I might have gotten the address wrong.
I was wrong to speak of your friend as I did the other day.
And maybe I was wrong for doing it, maybe we both were, but he's not a bad person.
I know what I said yesterday was right about this being crazy... but I sure am sorry you wouldn't let me join up.
No, there was a time where I though you were the smartest person I had never met, but listening to you now, if that is the way you think, then I was wrong about you as you are about me.
Now, if I got it wrong about you, I'd like a chance to make things right.
I like to think I know people, but I was wrong about you.
I know I'm not supposed to just stand up and blurt things out in here and I really don't want to go to jail today, but... I need to say that I was wrong about Eloise's grandfather.
I was wrong about your friend and about you.
You know, I guess I was wrong about that guy.
